content:
You sit and converse with Etra for a while, letting your worries melt away. "Beautiful, isn't it?" he says, motioning to the gleeful crowd. Together you watch with smiles on your faces as the people of Spire dance, feast, and play.

Discard all   from Etra and add 1 mirth token to him. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Ready FUN AND GAMES.
